description: Easy Trail with an amazing EndVery nice view over the Ocean
directions: Drive the Bay St.Lawrence Road , than first Road right after the left turn at Sugar-Loaf, drive 5 km 6014 Rd. (Dirtroad) , Trailhead on the right is marked with an small orange plastic-sign on a tree and two very little piles of rocks  beside the road.
title: Kauzmann-Trail
